AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being transported by RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. in his white Malibu sedan, including those in the trunk, admitted to being in the country illegally, potentially harbored in vehicles near the Mexico border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan associated with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR., stopped by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino near Farm-to-Market Road 2050, transporting undocumented aliens, including five passengers and two in the trunk, driven on a road primarily used by local residents and oil company employees
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck associated with IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., stopped at the Freer Immigration Checkpoint, also referred to as "a black one", heading towards Highway 59 and then turning southbound onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050, with a camper, either dark blue or black in color, involved in a traffic stop by Officer Reymundo Reyes, where IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. exhibited nervous behavior during the stop, and was impounded due to unclear ownership and lack of insurance information, not recognizable by United States Border Patrol agents as a typical vehicle on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
